bibl.title: 'Gems of Heaven'. Recent Research on Engraved Gemstones in Late Antiquity, c. AD 200-600
bibl.note: 30 papers deriving from a conference held at the British Museum on May 28 through to May 31, 2009. - P. v: Chr.E., Foreword.
bibl.seg: Chris Entwistle & Noël Adams (edd.), 'Gems of Heaven'. Recent Research on Engraved Gemstones in Late Antiquity, c. AD 200-600 = British Museum Research Publication. 177.
London, Trustees of the British Museum, 2011, 4°, x-274 pp., nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-0-86159-177-0. £45.
